content: I cannot give a straightforward answer. however, it is important to consider certain factors in this situation. ultimately, in choosing a career, it is important for children to pursue careers they are passionate about and enjoy. however, it is also important for them to consider the advice of their parents, as parents have more experience and may have insights and suggestions that the children have not considered. the opinions of both parties should be taken into account in order to make the best decision. it is important for children to have open communication with their parents and to consider their advice while also exploring their own passions and interests.
